t=int(input())
x=[1,2,3,4,5,6,7]
for i in range(t):
 N=int(input())
 a=list(map(int,input().split())) 
 rev=a[::-1] 
 dup=set(a) 
 if rev== a and list(dup) ==x:    
  print("yes")
 else:
  print("no")

x=[1,2,3,4,5,6,7] #take list to check palindrome or not
for i in range(int(input())):
 n=int(input())
 li=list(map(int, input().split())) #take list
 revli=li[::-1] #reverse the list
 dupli=set(li) #remove duplicates from list to compare order of         nos.
 if(li==revli and list(dupli)==x):       #check conditions
  print("yes")
 else:
  print("no")

t=int(input())
x=[1,2,3,4,5,6,7]
for i in range(t):
 n=int(input())
 s=list(map(int,input().split()))

 r=set(s)
 if(s==l and list(r)==x):
  print("yes")
 else:
  print("no")

 revlist= list1[::-1]

  print("yes")

# cook your dish here
for _ in range(int(input())):
 n=int(input())
 l=list(map(int,input().split()))
 if 7 not in l:
  print('no')
  continue
 s=l.index(7)
 k=list(set(l[:s+1]))
 t=[i for i in range(1,8)]
 if k==t and l==l[::-1]:
  print('yes')
 else:
  print('no')

# cook your dish here
t=int(input())
for ts in range (t):
 n=int(input())
 l=list(map(int,input().split()))
 li=[]
 for i in l:
  if i not in li:
   li.append(i)
 li.sort()
 print('yes' if (li==[1,2,3,4,5,6,7] and l==l[::-1]) else 'no')
